mailSubject: Updated Checklist for J.P. MORGAN SECURITIES PLC (LEI ID: K6Q0W1PS1L1O4IQL9C32)
mailBody:
Dear Client,

I hope this message finds you well.

Following our previous correspondence, I have updated the checklist for J.P. MORGAN SECURITIES PLC (LEI ID: K6Q0W1PS1L1O4IQL9C32) based on the missing and pending information identified. Below is the updated checklist:

### Updated Checklist Table:

| **Checklist Item**                     | **Status**  | **Comment**                                                                                         | **Source**                      |
|----------------------------------------|-------------|-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|---------------------------------|
| Company Address Proof                  | Validated   | Utility Bill issued by London City Utilities is valid until 2023-12-31.                            | DIM_CompanyAddressProof        |
| Company Annual Account and Ellipro Survey | Validated | Data for the years 2020, 2021, and 2022 is available; Ellipro scores are provided.                 | DIM_CompanyAnnualAccountsAndElliproSurvey |
| Company Bank and Postal Details        | Validated   | Bank account and postal details are available, including SWIFT code and postal code.               | DIM_CompanyBankAndPostalDetails |
| Company Directorship                   | Pending     | Verification for directors is still pending or under review as per provided attachment.            | EmailAttachment                |
| Company Tax Documentation              | Pending     | Some documents are verified; others are pending or require renewal.                               | DIM_CompanyTaxDocuments         |
| Company Regulatory Compliance          | Pending     | Industry License and Environmental Compliance are under review.                                    | DIM_CompanyRegulatory           |
| Company Business Scope                 | Validated   | Detailed information about business activities, global operations, and community role.            | RagAgent                       |
| Company PEP Screening                  | Validated   | PEP screening data verified from attachment; risks mitigated per AML regulations.                 | EmailAttachment                |
| Company Revenue Details                | Validated   | Revenue details were disclosed: Total net revenue of 158.1 billion dollars (2023).                | RagAgent                       |
| Company Market Capitalization Details  | Validated   | Market capitalization disclosed: 489,320 million dollars as of December 31, 2023.                | RagAgent                       |

Please review the updated checklist and let me know if there are any further issues or if you require any additional information.

Thank you for your attention to this matter.

Best regards,  
Surbhi Nagori  
surbhi.nagori@capgemini.com
